title: Bug Bounty: XSS in FinTech App
description: Discovered and reported a stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in a major FinTech application. The flaw allowed attackers to inject malicious scripts into transaction notes.

title: Network Intrusion Detection System
description: Built a custom IDS using Python and Scapy to detect potential port scanning and ARP spoofing attacks within a local network.

title: Secure Chat Application
description: Developed an end-to-end encrypted chat application using React, Node.js, and Signal Protocol implementation for message security.

title: Automated Recon Tool
description: A Bash script wrapper that ties together Nmap, Gobuster, and Nikto to automate the initial reconnaissance phase of penetration testing.
